executable.title: Gaussian Blur BatchMake
executable.description: Run Gaussian Blur module as a batch process. Iterating for a range of sigma values and for a number of files.

parameters.label: Sigma Range
parameters.description: The range of sigma values to be processed.

double.name: sigmaMin
double.description: Sigma minimum value for range to be processed
double.label: Sigma minimum

double.name: sigmaMax
double.description: Sigma maximum value for range to be processed
double.label: Sigma maximum

double.name: sigmaStep
double.description: Change in sigma value per iteration from min to max
double.label: Sigma step

directory.name: dataDir
directory.description: Diretory containing the datafiles to be processed
directory.label: Data directory
directory.description: Directory where to find input images

string.name: dataMask
string.description: Wildcard/mask to apply to the directory listing to select only the images to be processed
string.label: Data file mask

boolean.name: dataMaskRecursive
boolean.description: Automatically descend into subdirs to find input files
boolean.label: Recursive

directory.name: outputDir
directory.label: Output directory
directory.description: Directory where to put the processed images

boolean.name: runUsingCondor
boolean.description: Select to run on local grid using Condor (BatchMake must have been compiled using Condor)
boolean.label: Run using Grid/Condor
